org.mapsforge.core.util

Class MercatorProjection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapsforge.core.util.MercatorProjection

  • public final class MercatorProjection
extends Object
    An implementation of the spherical Mercator projection.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double EARTH_CIRCUMFERENCE
      The circumference of the earth at the equator in meters.

      Maximum possible latitude coordinate of the map.
      static double LATITUDE_MIN
      Minimum possible latitude coordinate of the map.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateGroundResolution

        public static double calculateGroundResolution(double latitude,
                                               byte zoomLevel)
        Calculates the distance on the ground that is represented by a single pixel on the map.
        Parameters:
        latitude - the latitude coordinate at which the resolution should be calculated.
        zoomLevel - the zoom level at which the resolution should be calculated.
        Returns:
        the ground resolution at the given latitude and zoom level.

      • deltaLat

        public static double deltaLat(double deltaPixel,
                              double lat,
                              byte zoom)
        Computes the amount of latitude degrees for a given distance in pixel at a given zoom level.
        Parameters:
        deltaPixel - the delta in pixel
        lat - the latitude
        zoom - the zoom level
        Returns:
        the delta in degrees

      • getMapSize

        public static long getMapSize(byte zoomLevel)
        Parameters:
        zoomLevel - the zoom level for which the size of the world map should be returned.
        Returns:
        the horizontal and vertical size of the map in pixel at the given zoom level.

      • latitudeToPixelY

        public static double latitudeToPixelY(double latitude,
                                      byte zoomLevel)
        Converts a latitude coordinate (in degrees) to a pixel Y coordinate at a certain zoom level.
        Parameters:
        latitude - the latitude coordinate that should be converted.
        zoomLevel - the zoom level at which the coordinate should be converted.
        Returns:
        the pixel Y coordinate of the latitude value.

      • latitudeToTileY

                                   byte zoomLevel)

        Parameters:
        latitude - the latitude coordinate that should be converted.
        zoomLevel - the zoom level at which the coordinate should be converted.
        Returns:
        the tile Y number of the latitude value.
